Document.Focus: Choosing a Doctor or Health Care Service

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Choosing a Doctor or Health Care Service ?
QAPair.Answer: We all want high-quality health care, but it's hard to know how to choose. There are many things to consider, including - What your insurance covers - Whether a health care provider or service is accredited - The location of a service - Hours that the service is available - Whether you like a health care provider's personality On this page you'll find information to help you choose a health care provider or service.
